snippet.title: Cursed Roots - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Cured Roots is a fast-paced horror point & click adventure featuring retro-inspired art, difficult puzzles and monsters around every corner! Use your wits to solve puzzles, combine items and escape from a house full of monstrosities! Can you escape from your Cursed Roots? 

Wishlist it now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1098730/Cursed_Roots/

==============================================
Cursed Roots is a game by MastroBros
- Website: http://www.cursedroots.com/
- Steam store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1098730/Cursed_Roots/
- Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/CursedRoots
- Follow us on IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/cursed-roots

==============================================
Music by Nicolas Gasparini ("Myuu") 
- Website: http://www.thedarkpiano.com/
- YouTube: http://youtube.com/myuuji
